title: Courgette quiche with black olives
ingredients: ['400g courgettes, washed and sliced thinly', '50g pitted olives, pitted and sliced thinly', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1 onion, minced', '4 rosemary sprigs, minced', '3 eggs, beaten', '100g quark or natural Greek yoghurt', '100g grated Gruyere cheese', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', 'salt and pepper', '1 savoury ready rolled shortcrust pastry']
